languages.text: "Верно, но не здесь. Я бы не хотел, чтобы наш разговор стал достоянием сплетен на мостике и в офицерских каютах".

traits.locale_text: "Верно, но не здесь. Я бы не хотел, чтобы наш разговор стал достоянием сплетен на мостике и в офицерских каютах".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Yes, but not here. I wouldn't want our conversation to be gossip fodder on the bridge and in the officers' mess."
languages.original_text: "Верно, но не здесь. Я бы не хотел, чтобы наш разговор стал достоянием сплетен на мостике и в офицерских каютах".

traits.locale_text: "Yes, but not here. I wouldn't want our conversation to be gossip fodder on the bridge and in the officers' mess."

traits.locale_text: "Yes, but not here. I wouldn't want our conversation to be gossip fodder on the bridge and in the officers' mess."

languages.text: “是啊，但这里不行。我可不希望我们的谈话被别人听去，成为舰桥与军官餐厅闲言碎语的素材。”
languages.original_text: "Yes, but not here. I wouldn't want our conversation to be gossip fodder on the bridge and in the officers' mess."

traits.locale_text: “是啊，但这里不行。我可不希望我们的谈话被别人听去，成为舰桥与军官餐厅闲言碎语的素材。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "Yes, but not here. I wouldn't want our conversation to be gossip fodder on the bridge and in the officers' mess."

languages.text: «Sí, pero aquí no. No quiero que nuestra conversación alimente los cuchicheos del puente y la cantina de los oficiales».
languages.original_text: "Yes, but not here. I wouldn't want our conversation to be gossip fodder on the bridge and in the officers' mess."

traits.locale_text: «Sí, pero aquí no. No quiero que nuestra conversación alimente los cuchicheos del puente y la cantina de los oficiales».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「ああ、だがここでは話せない。ブリッジや士官用の食堂で、我々の会話をゴシップの種にされたくはないからな」
languages.original_text: "Yes, but not here. I wouldn't want our conversation to be gossip fodder on the bridge and in the officers' mess."

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、だがここでは話せない。ブリッジや士官用の食堂で、我々の会話をゴシップの種にされたくはないからな」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Ja, doch nicht hier. Ich möchte nicht, dass unsere Unterhaltung Gerüchte auf der Brücke und in der Offiziersmesse nährt."
languages.original_text: "Yes, but not here. I wouldn't want our conversation to be gossip fodder on the bridge and in the officers' mess."

traits.locale_text: "Ja, doch nicht hier. Ich möchte nicht, dass unsere Unterhaltung Gerüchte auf der Brücke und in der Offiziersmesse nährt."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Oui, mais pas ici. Je ne voudrais pas que notre conversation alimente les ragots sur la passerelle ou dans le mess des officiers. »
languages.original_text: "Yes, but not here. I wouldn't want our conversation to be gossip fodder on the bridge and in the officers' mess."

traits.locale_text: « Oui, mais pas ici. Je ne voudrais pas que notre conversation alimente les ragots sur la passerelle ou dans le mess des officiers. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Evet de burada değil. Şimdi burada ne konuşsak köprüdekilerin, subayların ağzına sakız olur."
languages.original_text: "Yes, but not here. I wouldn't want our conversation to be gossip fodder on the bridge and in the officers' mess."

traits.locale_text: "Evet de burada değil. Şimdi burada ne konuşsak köprüdekilerin, subayların ağzına sakız olur."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
